<title level="1" right="Trait">[Hampering](/Traits.aspx?ID=806)</title>

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 274 <sup>1.1</sup>

A weapon with the hampering trait includes a disruptive limb or flange. After you hit with the weapon, you can use an [Interact](/Actions.aspx?ID=2297) action to give the target a –10-foot circumstance penalty to all Speeds. The penalty ends after the target takes a [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=658) action, at the start of your next turn, if you attack with the weapon, or if you move out of reach of the target, whichever comes first.
name: Hampering
